chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
yes we have started
cool! i see a twig near our starting point leading to a small island with a tiger
where to next, mate?
we are head towards the parrot near the elephant
alright! going around the tiger's island, i'm seeing the big island with the parrot
i'm now near the parrot on a tree. what's the next move, buddy?
you will pass through the stone bridge that will help you cross the water and then you head towards the frog
gotcha! crossing over the 3 rock bridge now
hello, mr. frog! where to now?
hey there, estas listo?
yes i am ready
awesome! to kick things off, start by stepping a bit to your left, just below a wooden bench passing a trail
you'll see a florist stand nearby
okay thank you i have seen it
great! now, pull a quick 180 and head back the way you came, across the trail, towards our white dog friend
we won't go up to the florist stand just yet
okay got it
fantastic! now, you need to go south a bit, over a branch, just continue straight
you might spot another white dog chilling by a checkered picnic mat
yeah got it . thank you. what next?
sweet! now keep on heading down
make sure you cross over the picnic mat and pass by the bowl of berries on the way
okay i am heading there now. oh okay, got it
great stuff! now, start heading west, but be on the lookout for a wooden branch that crosses a river
you need to cross that branch heading north
okay i will be very attentive and look out for the the wooden branch. wow got it thank you
awesome job! after crossing the branch, you'll see a green bush
avoid touching it though
okay i will do as you instructed. wow got it
fantastic! now just follow the path as you circle the bush from the right side
hola, q tal? ready to play?
yeah i'm ready
great! i'm at the north, next to a tent
got a fire southwards with a pup chilling on the left, red mushroom on the right. where to from here?
alright follow up straight till you meet a dog
sweet! alright, i'm with the pup now
can i pet him or do i move on?
move on
okay, heading south then, i see a car and telescope
yes follow the path towards the car and the telescope
cool, i'm at the telescope now
should i keep heading south or change direction?
continue head south until you can see a wooden building that is surrounded with rocks
got it, i see the house and rocks
heading there now
alright
made it to the wooden house
*finished* this was fun, man! let's do it again sometime
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
yes i am ready
awesome! first, head towards the southwest, under the first palm tree
take a right by the second tree and then a sharp left before the third one. let's now go southward
okay i am there now . i can see two huge rocks
great eyes! you're doing a fab job
now, catch a glimpse of that adorable brown puppy? let's pass it to the left, slight left and then a smooth turn to the right going south
wow the puppy is so adorable . i have headed towards the right and i can see a speaker
no rush, buddy! first, let's find a way between the big rock on your left and the smaller one on your right
we're heading towards the ocean!
okay yeah i can find th
awesome! now let's take a quick dip
head into the water until you spot a large red crab
omg, i can see the red crab. its really large
cool, right? now, take a right, keeping the big rock on your side as you continue westwards in the water
okay i am keeping the path you structed
you're doing awesome! after you pass a third mid-size rock, you'll see a shark
don’t worry, it's a friendly one. turn right sharply here
oh okay, can i pet the shark?
haha, i wouldn't suggest that, mate! let's get back on land now, heading north, squeezing between the medium rock and a freakishly colorful ball
